node.name: Meetings
node.description: Meetings are an important tool for getting stuff done, and for making sure your team is in sync. But there aren‚Äôt novelty awards that read ‚ÄúI survived another meeting that could have been an email‚Äù for nothing. Find techniques and templates in this topic for making the most of meetings (not making the most meetings).
